abilities.name: beastmaster_wild_axes
abilities.title: Wild Axes
abilities.detail: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once.

abilities.name: beastmaster_call_of_the_wild
abilities.title: Call of the Wild
abilities.detail:
Beastmaster calls allies in the form of a watchful Hawk and a powerful Boar.  Previous summons are removed upon casting.

Level 1: Summons Scout Hawk.
Level 2: Summons Scout Hawk and Lesser Boar.
Level 3: Summons Greater Hawk and Lesser Boar.
Level 4: Summons Greater Hawk and Greater Boar.

abilities.name: beastmaster_inner_beast
abilities.title: Inner Beast
abilities.detail: Untaps the inner fury of allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: beastmaster_primal_roar
abilities.title: Primal Roar
abilities.detail:
A deafening roar that deals damage and stuns the target enemy unit, while opening a path between Beastmaster and his prey. Nearby enemies also take damage and have their movement speed and attack rate reduced.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: earthshaker_fissure
abilities.title: Fissure
abilities.detail: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, fissuring the earth while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.  Creates an impassable ridge of stone.

abilities.name: earthshaker_enchant_totem
abilities.title: Enchant Totem
abilities.detail: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.

abilities.name: earthshaker_aftershock
abilities.title: Aftershock
abilities.detail: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: earthshaker_echo_slam
abilities.title: Echo Slam
abilities.detail:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: kunkka_torrent
abilities.title: Torrent
abilities.detail: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: kunkka_tidebringer
abilities.title: Tidebringer
abilities.detail: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: kunkka_x_marks_the_spot
abilities.title: X Marks the Spot
abilities.detail: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration.

abilities.name: kunkka_ghostship
abilities.title: Ghostship
abilities.detail: Summons a ghostship to cut a swath through battle, causing damage and stuns to enemy units as it crashes through. Allies are doused in Kunkka's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to damage.

abilities.name: kunkka_return
abilities.title: Return
abilities.detail: Returns the marked hero to the X.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_breathe_fire
abilities.title: Breathe Fire
abilities.detail: Unleashes a breath of fire on enemy units in a line in front of Dragon Knight.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_dragon_tail
abilities.title: Dragon Tail
abilities.detail: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_dragon_blood
abilities.title: Dragon Blood
abilities.detail: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: dragon_knight_elder_dragon_form
abilities.title: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.detail:
Dragon Knight can take the form of three powerful elder dragons.
LEVEL 1 - Green Dragon: Short poison damage over time on attack.
LEVEL 2 - Red Dragon: Splash damage on attack.
LEVEL 3 - Blue Dragon: Splash damage and frost attack that slows enemy units.

abilities.name: huskar_inner_vitality
abilities.title: Inner Vitality
abilities.detail: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 40% it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: huskar_burning_spear
abilities.title: Burning Spear
abilities.detail:
Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Burning Spears is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: huskar_berserkers_blood
abilities.title: Berserker's Blood
abilities.detail: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic resistance based on missing health.

abilities.name: huskar_life_break
abilities.title: Life Break
abilities.detail:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to inflict a percentage of that hero's current HP, and slow at the cost of his own vitality.  While leaping, Huskar is magic immune.  Slow lasts 5 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: alchemist_acid_spray
abilities.title: Acid Spray
abilities.detail: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take mixed damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: alchemist_unstable_concoction
abilities.title: Unstable Concoction
abilities.detail: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 7 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: alchemist_goblins_greed
abilities.title: Greevil's Greed
abilities.detail: Alchemist gets bonus gold for killing creeps; the bonus stacks if the creeps are killed within a period of time, after which the count is reset.  The bonus gold is capped at 30 gold.

abilities.name: alchemist_chemical_rage
abilities.title: Chemical Rage
abilities.detail: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed, hitpoints and regeneration.

abilities.name: alchemist_unstable_concoction_throw
abilities.title: Unstable Concoction Throw
abilities.detail: Throw it before it blows up!

abilities.name: brewmaster_thunder_clap
abilities.title: Thunder Clap
abilities.detail: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

abilities.name: brewmaster_drunken_haze
abilities.title: Drunken Haze
abilities.detail: Drenches an enemy unit in alcohol, causing his movement speed to be reduced, and causing his attacks to have a chance to miss.

abilities.name: brewmaster_drunken_brawler
abilities.title: Drunken Brawler
abilities.detail: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage.

abilities.name: brewmaster_primal_split
abilities.title: Primal Split
abilities.detail:
Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: centaur_hoof_stomp
abilities.title: Hoof Stomp
abilities.detail: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: centaur_double_edge
abilities.title: Double Edge
abilities.detail: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: centaur_return
abilities.title: Return
abilities.detail: Centaur immediately counters every attack, damaging the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

abilities.name: centaur_stampede
abilities.title: Stampede
abilities.detail: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow enemy units they tread upon. Each enemy can be trampled once and takes damage based on the Warrunner's strength.

abilities.name: bristleback_viscous_nasal_goo
abilities.title: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.detail: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

abilities.name: bristleback_quill_spray
abilities.title: Quill Spray
abilities.detail: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14 seconds.

abilities.name: bristleback_bristleback
abilities.title: Bristleback
abilities.detail: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 250 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: bristleback_warpath
abilities.title: Warpath
abilities.detail: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.  The first stack (base) provides larger bonuses.

abilities.name: elder_titan_echo_stomp
abilities.title: Echo Stomp
abilities.detail: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.  Unconscious enemies will wake if they take damage.

abilities.name: elder_titan_ancestral_spirit
abilities.title: Astral Spirit
abilities.detail:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through.  When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage and movement speed for each unit it damaged.

The Astral Spirit possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abilities.name: elder_titan_natural_order
abilities.title: Natural Order
abilities.detail: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic resistance from nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: elder_titan_return_spirit
abilities.title: Return Astral Spirit
abilities.detail: Returns the Astral Spirit to Elder Titan.

abilities.name: elder_titan_earth_splitter
abilities.title: Earth Splitter
abilities.detail: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan.  After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing them while dealing damage based on the maximum life of units caught in the area.

abilities.name: antimage_mana_break
abilities.title: Mana Break
abilities.detail:
Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: antimage_blink
abilities.title: Blink
abilities.detail: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: antimage_spell_shield
abilities.title: Spell Shield
abilities.detail: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

abilities.name: antimage_mana_void
abilities.title: Mana Void
abilities.detail: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: mirana_starfall
abilities.title: Starstorm
abilities.detail: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. One random enemy unit in 175 range will take a second hit for 75% of the damage.

abilities.name: mirana_arrow
abilities.title: Sacred Arrow
abilities.detail: Fires an arrow with deadly precision, dealing large damage and stunning the first enemy unit it strikes. Stun duration increases based on distance to target, ranging from 0.5 to 5 seconds. Bonus damage up to 100 is applied based on distance to target.

abilities.name: mirana_leap
abilities.title: Leap
abilities.detail: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar upon landing, granting attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: mirana_invis
abilities.title: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.detail: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If Invisibility is broken, it will restore after fade delay if the shadow's duration has not expired.  Silence will stop Moonlight Shadow.

abilities.name: juggernaut_blade_fury
abilities.title: Blade Fury
abilities.detail: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.

abilities.name: juggernaut_healing_ward
abilities.title: Healing Ward
abilities.detail: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 300 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.

abilities.name: juggernaut_blade_dance
abilities.title: Blade Dance
abilities.detail: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

abilities.name: juggernaut_omni_slash
abilities.title: Omnislash
abilities.detail:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 175-250 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: morphling_waveform
abilities.title: Waveform
abilities.detail: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

abilities.name: morphling_adaptive_strike
abilities.title: Adaptive Strike
abilities.detail: Strikes an enemy unit with a blast of water. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, it deals the maximum damage and the minimum stun. If strength is 50% higher, it deals the maximum stun and minimum damage.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_agi
abilities.title: Morph (Agility Gain)
abilities.detail: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Agility.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_str
abilities.title: Morph (Strength Gain)
abilities.detail: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Morph increase the rate of stat change.  Passively grants bonus Strength.

abilities.name: morphling_replicate
abilities.title: Replicate
abilities.detail: Morphling replicates any hero, friend or foe, although only dealing 50% the original hero's damage.  At any time, Morphling can instantly take the position of the Replicate.

abilities.name: morphling_morph_replicate
abilities.title: Morph Replicate
abilities.detail: Morphling switches into his replication, instantly taking its position.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_refraction
abilities.title: Refraction
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage while gaining a bonus to her damage.  These effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances

abilities.name: templar_assassin_meld
abilities.title: Meld
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin conceals herself, gaining invisibility while remaining still.  On the next attacked enemy unit, Lanaya will reduce its armor and deal bonus damage to it.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_psi_blades
abilities.title: Psi Blades
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_trap
abilities.title: Trap
abilities.detail: Springs the nearest trap, slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: templar_assassin_psionic_trap
abilities.title: Psionic Trap
abilities.detail: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung, at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow more by 5% for each second up to 50%.

abilities.name: luna_lucent_beam
abilities.title: Lucent Beam
abilities.detail: Luna channels a concentrated beam of lunar energy at an enemy, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: luna_moon_glaive
abilities.title: Moon Glaive
abilities.detail: Allows Luna's glaive to bounce to enemy units near the attacked unit. Each bounce deals less damage.

abilities.name: luna_lunar_blessing
abilities.title: Lunar Blessing
abilities.detail: Grants bonus damage to nearby allies, while blessing Luna with extra night vision.

abilities.name: luna_eclipse
abilities.title: Eclipse
abilities.detail:
Calls an eclipse that follows Luna, striking units with her current level of Lucent Beam.  A single target can only be hit a maximum times.  Unlike individual Lucent Beams, Eclipse does not stun.  Eclipse turns day into night for 10 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_shuriken_toss
abilities.title: Shuriken Toss
abilities.detail: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_jinada
abilities.title: Jinada
abilities.detail: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_wind_walk
abilities.title: Shadow Walk
abilities.detail: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: bounty_hunter_track
abilities.title: Track
abilities.detail: Tracks an enemy hero, giving True Sight of it and grants a gain in movement speed to allies near the hunted. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bounty in gold.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_rocket_barrage
abilities.title: Rocket Barrage
abilities.detail: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_homing_missile
abilities.title: Homing Missile
abilities.detail: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_flak_cannon
abilities.title: Flak Cannon
abilities.detail: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: gyrocopter_call_down
abilities.title: Call Down
abilities.detail:
Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow; the second dealing minor damage and major slow.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: lone_druid_spirit_bear
abilities.title: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.detail: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  If the Spirit Bear dies, the Lone Druid suffers composite damage as backlash.  As the bear increases in levels, it can learn the Return, Entangling Claws, and Demolish abilities.  Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

abilities.name: lone_druid_rabid
abilities.title: Rabid
abilities.detail: Increases the attack and movement speed of Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: lone_druid_synergy
abilities.title: Synergy
abilities.detail: Increases the Lone Druid's synergy with his Spirit Bear and himself, upgrading attributes and abilities.

abilities.name: lone_druid_true_form_battle_cry
abilities.title: Battle Cry
abilities.detail: Adds damage and armor to the Lone Druid and his Spirit Bear.

abilities.name: lone_druid_true_form
abilities.title: True Form
abilities.detail: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage and some base movement speed, but gaining melee power as well as the Battle Cry ability.  He can morph freely between druid and bear form.

abilities.name: lone_druid_true_form_druid
abilities.title: Druid Form
abilities.detail: Return to Druid form.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_crystal_nova
abilities.title: Crystal Nova
abilities.detail: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_frostbite
abilities.title: Frostbite
abilities.detail: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage per second.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_brilliance_aura
abilities.title: Arcane Aura
abilities.detail: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is doubled on Crystal Maiden.

abilities.name: crystal_maiden_freezing_field
abilities.title: Freezing Field
abilities.detail:
CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts 7 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: lina_dragon_slave
abilities.title: Dragon Slave
abilities.detail: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: lina_light_strike_array
abilities.title: Light Strike Array
abilities.detail: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: lina_fiery_soul
abilities.title: Fiery Soul
abilities.detail: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 7 seconds.

abilities.name: lina_laguna_blade
abilities.title: Laguna Blade
abilities.detail:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: furion_sprout
abilities.title: Sprout
abilities.detail: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

abilities.name: furion_teleportation
abilities.title: Teleportation
abilities.detail: Teleports to any point on the map.

abilities.name: furion_force_of_nature
abilities.title: Nature's Call
abilities.detail: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have 550 hit points and deal 21-23 damage.

abilities.name: furion_wrath_of_nature
abilities.title: Wrath of Nature
abilities.detail:
Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: chen_penitence
abilities.title: Penitence
abilities.detail: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

abilities.name: chen_test_of_faith
abilities.title: Test of Faith
abilities.detail: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith.

abilities.name: chen_test_of_faith_teleport
abilities.title: Test of Faith
abilities.detail: Teleports a friendly unit back to the base.  Creeps are teleported instantly, Heroes have a delay before teleporting.

abilities.name: chen_holy_persuasion
abilities.title: Holy Persuasion
abilities.detail: Gives control of an enemy or neutral creep, and gives it bonus hit points.

abilities.name: chen_hand_of_god
abilities.title: Hand of God
abilities.detail:
Fully regenerates any creeps under Chen's control and heals all allied heroes on the map.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: enchantress_untouchable
abilities.title: Untouchable
abilities.detail: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: enchantress_enchant
abilities.title: Enchant
abilities.detail: Enchantress charms an enemy, bringing it under her control (if a creep) or slowing it (if a hero).

abilities.name: enchantress_natures_attendants
abilities.title: Nature's Attendants
abilities.detail: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby.  Lasts 10 seconds.

abilities.name: enchantress_impetus
abilities.title: Impetus
abilities.detail:
Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.

Impetus is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_fireblast
abilities.title: Fireblast
abilities.detail: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_ignite
abilities.title: Ignite
abilities.detail: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_bloodlust
abilities.title: Bloodlust
abilities.detail: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_unrefined_fireblast
abilities.title: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.detail: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: ogre_magi_multicast
abilities.title: Multicast
abilities.detail:
Enables the Ogre Magi to rapidly cast his spells, giving them greater potency. Gives a chance to cast a spell multiple times in one cast. Increases Fireblast's mana cost and decreases its cooldown, adds an area of effect to Ignite and reduces Bloodlust's cooldown and gives it a chance to cast on random allies around Ogre Magi.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: disruptor_thunder_strike
abilities.title: Thunder Strike
abilities.detail: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.

abilities.name: disruptor_glimpse
abilities.title: Glimpse
abilities.detail: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.name: disruptor_kinetic_field
abilities.title: Kinetic Field
abilities.detail: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: disruptor_static_storm
abilities.title: Static Storm
abilities.detail: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

abilities.name: life_stealer_rage
abilities.title: Rage
abilities.detail: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming immune to magic spells and gaining increased attack speed.

abilities.name: life_stealer_feast
abilities.title: Feast
abilities.detail: Regenerates a portion of the attacked enemy's current HP and deals the same portion of damage per attack.

abilities.name: life_stealer_open_wounds
abilities.title: Open Wounds
abilities.detail: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movespeed and allowing all allies to lifesteal on that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

abilities.name: life_stealer_infest
abilities.title: Infest
abilities.detail: Lifestealer will infest the body of the target unit, lying dormant and undetectable inside. When he reveals himself, he deals damage to all nearby enemy units. If the unit is a creep, he will devour it first, gaining health equal to the unit's current HP.  Does not work on enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: life_stealer_consume
abilities.title: Consume
abilities.detail: Lifestealer eats the host body from the inside out.

abilities.name: axe_berserkers_call
abilities.title: Berserker's Call
abilities.detail: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: axe_battle_hunger
abilities.title: Battle Hunger
abilities.detail: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.

abilities.name: axe_counter_helix
abilities.title: Counter Helix
abilities.detail: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: axe_culling_blade
abilities.title: Culling Blade
abilities.detail:
Axe spots weakness and strikes, dealing moderate damage but instantly killing an enemy unit with low health.  When an enemy unit is killed in this way, Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: lycan_summon_wolves
abilities.title: Summon Wolves
abilities.detail: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycanthrope.  Level 2-4 wolves have Critical Strike, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.

abilities.name: lycan_howl
abilities.title: Howl
abilities.detail: Grants bonus damage to Lycanthrope, all allied heroes and all units under their control.

abilities.name: lycan_feral_impulse
abilities.title: Feral Impulse
abilities.detail: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycanthrope and all units under his control.

abilities.name: lycan_shapeshift
abilities.title: Shapeshift
abilities.detail: Lycanthrope assumes his true form, increasing his combat capabilities.  During Shapeshift, Lycanthrope and all units under his control move at maximum speed and cannot be slowed.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_bolt
abilities.title: Chaos Bolt
abilities.detail: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_reality_rift
abilities.title: Reality Rift
abilities.detail: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Gives you bonus attack damage for one attack.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_chaos_strike
abilities.title: Chaos Strike
abilities.detail: Chaos Knight's mojo gives him a chance to deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: chaos_knight_phantasm
abilities.title: Phantasm
abilities.detail: Summons several copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The illusions deal full damage, but take double damage.

abilities.name: abaddon_death_coil
abilities.title: Mist Coil
abilities.detail: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: abaddon_aphotic_shield
abilities.title: Aphotic Shield
abilities.detail: Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating a shield that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the shield is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

abilities.name: abaddon_frostmourne
abilities.title: Curse of Avernus
abilities.detail: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.

abilities.name: abaddon_borrowed_time
abilities.title: Borrowed Time
abilities.detail:
When activated, most negative buffs will be removed and any damage you take will heal instead of damaging you. If the ability is not in cooldown, it will passively activate when your hitpoints drop below a certain threshold.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: magnataur_shockwave
abilities.title: Shockwave
abilities.detail: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.

abilities.name: magnataur_empower
abilities.title: Empower
abilities.detail: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

abilities.name: magnataur_skewer
abilities.title: Skewer
abilities.detail: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Units hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: magnataur_reverse_polarity
abilities.title: Reverse Polarity
abilities.detail: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

abilities.name: faceless_void_time_walk
abilities.title: Time Walk
abilities.detail: Rushes to a target location while slowing the movement and attack speed of all enemies along its path for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: faceless_void_backtrack
abilities.title: Backtrack
abilities.detail: Faceless Void dodges damage by jumping backward in time, eluding both physical and magical attacks.

abilities.name: faceless_void_time_lock
abilities.title: Time Lock
abilities.detail: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.  The duration is twice as long against creeps.

abilities.name: faceless_void_chronosphere
abilities.title: Chronosphere
abilities.detail:
Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: nevermore_shadowraze1
abilities.title: Shadowraze
abilities.detail: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.

abilities.name: nevermore_necromastery
abilities.title: Necromastery
abilities.detail: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.

abilities.name: nevermore_dark_lord
abilities.title: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.detail: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: nevermore_requiem
abilities.title: Requiem of Souls
abilities.detail: Captured souls are used to deal massive damage, as well as slowing and reducing the attack damage of nearby enemy units. Requiem of Souls creates one wave of damage for every 2 souls stored by Necromastery.  The closest enemy units are hit the hardest.  Requiem has a 1 second cast time before it is activated.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast when Shadow Fiend dies, independent of its cooldown.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate
abilities.title: Illuminate
abilities.detail: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak
abilities.title: Mana Leak
abilities.detail: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic
abilities.title: Chakra Magic
abilities.detail: Restores mana to the target unit.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_recall
abilities.title: Recall
abilities.detail: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light
abilities.title: Blinding Light
abilities.detail: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form
abilities.title: Spirit Form
abilities.detail: Ezalor turns his body luminescent temporarily, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate_end
abilities.title: Release Illuminate
abilities.detail: Release the channel early.

abilities.name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form_illuminate
abilities.title: Illuminate
abilities.detail: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.

abilities.name: clinkz_strafe
abilities.title: Strafe
abilities.detail: Clinkz attacks with a barrage of arrows.  Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time.

abilities.name: clinkz_searing_arrows
abilities.title: Searing Arrows
abilities.detail:
Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

Searing Arrows is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: clinkz_wind_walk
abilities.title: Skeleton Walk
abilities.detail: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

abilities.name: clinkz_death_pact
abilities.title: Death Pact
abilities.detail: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

abilities.name: broodmother_spawn_spiderlings
abilities.title: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.detail: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

abilities.name: broodmother_spin_web
abilities.title: Spin Web
abilities.detail: Throws out a web that renders Broodmother invisible in its vicinity, while also boosting regeneration, and granting a passive movement speed increase.  Webs never expire, but when the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

abilities.name: broodmother_incapacitating_bite
abilities.title: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.detail:
Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

Incapacitating Bite is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: broodmother_insatiable_hunger
abilities.title: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.detail: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

abilities.name: meepo_earthbind
abilities.title: Earthbind
abilities.detail: Tosses a net at the target point, pinning down all enemy units.  Earthbind prevents invisibility, blink, and interrupts channeling.

abilities.name: meepo_poof
abilities.title: Poof
abilities.detail: Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, dealing damage in both the departure and arrival locations.

abilities.name: meepo_geostrike
abilities.title: Geostrike
abilities.detail: Meepo enchants his weapon to deal damage per second, as well as slow the movement speed of the attacked unit.  Geostrikes from multiple Meepos stack.

abilities.name: meepo_divided_we_stand
abilities.title: Divided We Stand
abilities.detail:
Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears. The cloned Meepos also gain 30% of any bonus attributes the primary Meepo has.  If any of the clones die, they all die.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: nyx_assassin_impale
abilities.title: Impale
abilities.detail: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: nyx_assassin_mana_burn
abilities.title: Mana Burn
abilities.detail: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

abilities.name: nyx_assassin_spiked_carapace
abilities.title: Spiked Carapace
abilities.detail: When activated, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage.

abilities.name: nyx_assassin_vendetta
abilities.title: Vendetta
abilities.detail: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

abilities.name: medusa_split_shot
abilities.title: Split Shot
abilities.detail:
Medusa magically splits her shot into five arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.  

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: medusa_mystic_snake
abilities.title: Mystic Snake
abilities.detail: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing some mana. After it reaches its last target, it jumps back to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage and steals more mana per jump.

abilities.name: medusa_mana_shield
abilities.title: Mana Shield
abilities.detail: Creates a shield that absorbs 50% of the incoming damage by using Medusa's mana.

abilities.name: medusa_stone_gaze
abilities.title: Stone Gaze
abilities.detail: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100% magic resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

abilities.name: lion_impale
abilities.title: Earth Spike
abilities.detail: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: lion_voodoo
abilities.title: Hex
abilities.detail: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

abilities.name: lion_mana_drain
abilities.title: Mana Drain
abilities.detail: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

abilities.name: lion_finger_of_death
abilities.title: Finger of Death
abilities.detail:
Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.

Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: lich_frost_nova
abilities.title: Frost Blast
abilities.detail: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.

abilities.name: lich_frost_armor
abilities.title: Ice Armor
abilities.detail: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit, which adds armor and slows attacking melee units. Lasts 40 seconds.

abilities.name: lich_dark_ritual
abilities.title: Sacrifice
abilities.detail: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

abilities.name: lich_chain_frost
abilities.title: Chain Frost
abilities.detail:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces up to 10 times, slowing and damaging enemy units.  The first target is mini-stunned.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: enigma_malefice
abilities.title: Malefice
abilities.detail: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

abilities.name: enigma_demonic_conversion
abilities.title: Demonic Conversion
abilities.detail: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Engima himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

abilities.name: enigma_midnight_pulse
abilities.title: Midnight Pulse
abilities.detail: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

abilities.name: enigma_black_hole
abilities.title: Black Hole
abilities.detail: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.  The closer units get to the center, the more damage is dealt.

abilities.name: necrolyte_death_pulse
abilities.title: Death Pulse
abilities.detail: Necrolyte releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

abilities.name: necrolyte_heartstopper_aura
abilities.title: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.detail: Necrolyte stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

abilities.name: necrolyte_sadist
abilities.title: Sadist
abilities.detail: Necrolyte gains hp and mana regeneration for every unit he kills. Hero kills grant 10x the regen bonus.

abilities.name: necrolyte_reapers_scythe
abilities.title: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.detail:
Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing.  Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrolyte. 

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: death_prophet_carrion_swarm
abilities.title: Crypt Swarm
abilities.detail: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

abilities.name: death_prophet_silence
abilities.title: Silence
abilities.detail: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: death_prophet_witchcraft
abilities.title: Witchcraft
abilities.detail: Increases the potency of Death Prophet's spells, while providing a passive movement speed boost.  Reduces mana costs and cooldowns of Crypt Swarm and Silence, and adds additional spirits to Exorcism.

abilities.name: death_prophet_exorcism
abilities.title: Exorcism
abilities.detail: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 30 seconds.

abilities.name: dazzle_poison_touch
abilities.title: Poison Touch
abilities.detail:
Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, causing damage and slowness over time, and eventual paralysis.  Poison Touch mini-stuns on impact.  

At level 2, the slow increases after 1 second, and at levels 3 and 4, the target is stunned for 1 second after the slow.

abilities.name: dazzle_shallow_grave
abilities.title: Shallow Grave
abilities.detail: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.

abilities.name: dazzle_shadow_wave
abilities.title: Shadow Wave
abilities.detail: Shadow Wave heals several allies, which in turn cause damage equal to their healing in a small area around them.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave, and it does not count toward the number of targets.

abilities.name: dazzle_weave
abilities.title: Weave
abilities.detail:
Applies a buff that increases allied hero armor or decreases enemy hero armor in the target area, changing armor by 1 every second.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: leshrac_split_earth
abilities.title: Split Earth
abilities.detail: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: leshrac_diabolic_edict
abilities.title: Diabolic Edict
abilities.detail: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal mixed damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: leshrac_lightning_storm
abilities.title: Lightning Storm
abilities.detail: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then jumps to nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: leshrac_pulse_nova
abilities.title: Pulse Nova
abilities.detail:
Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: dark_seer_vacuum
abilities.title: Vacuum
abilities.detail: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

abilities.name: dark_seer_ion_shell
abilities.title: Ion Shell
abilities.detail: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: dark_seer_surge
abilities.title: Surge
abilities.detail: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

abilities.name: dark_seer_wall_of_replica
abilities.title: Wall of Replica
abilities.detail:
Raises a wall of warping light that damages and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: batrider_sticky_napalm
abilities.title: Sticky Napalm
abilities.detail: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.

abilities.name: batrider_flamebreak
abilities.title: Flamebreak
abilities.detail: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back and dealing damage to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: batrider_firefly
abilities.title: Firefly
abilities.detail: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a flaming trail from the air.  While flying, the trail of fire destroys trees and damages enemies in its path, and Batrider gains the movement capabilities of a flying unit.

abilities.name: batrider_flaming_lasso
abilities.title: Flaming Lasso
abilities.detail: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_cold_feet
abilities.title: Cold Feet
abilities.detail: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_ice_vortex
abilities.title: Ice Vortex
abilities.detail: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.  Lasts 12 seconds.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_chilling_touch
abilities.title: Chilling Touch
abilities.detail: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks, while slowing their attack speed slightly.  Lasts 30 seconds.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast
abilities.title: Ice Blast
abilities.detail:
An explosive ball of icy hail that can be used to strike targets anywhere on the map. On first use, Kaldr launches a tracer towards the targeted location.  The second use marks the current location of the blast, upon which the actual projectile is launched - the greater the distance, the larger the radius affected. It deals damage to enemy units and applies a frostbite curse to units in and around the area that prevents regeneration or healing. Frostbitten units will take minor damage over time; if the units drop below a certain percentage of hitpoints, they'll instantly shatter.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: ancient_apparition_ice_blast_release
abilities.title: Release
abilities.detail: Releases the ice blast early at its current location.

abilities.name: invoker_quas
abilities.title: Quas
abilities.detail: Allows manipulation of ice elements and grants a permanent strength bonus. Each Quas instance provides increased health regeneration.

abilities.name: invoker_wex
abilities.title: Wex
abilities.detail: Allows manipulation of storm elements and grants a permanent agility bonus. Each Wex instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

abilities.name: invoker_exort
abilities.title: Exort
abilities.detail: Allows manipulation of fire elements and grants a permanent intelligence bonus. Each Exort instance provides increased attack damage.

abilities.name: invoker_invoke
abilities.title: Invoke
abilities.detail:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated, creating a new spell at the Invoker's disposal. Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: invoker_cold_snap
abilities.title: Cold Snap
abilities.detail: Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of Quas. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of Quas.

abilities.name: invoker_ghost_walk
abilities.title: Ghost Walk
abilities.detail: Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of Wex.

abilities.name: invoker_tornado
abilities.title: Tornado
abilities.detail: Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of Wex. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of Quas. Deals damage based on the levels of Quas and Wex.

abilities.name: invoker_emp
abilities.title: EMP
abilities.detail: Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after a duration based on the level of Wex. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of Wex. Deals damage for each point of mana drained.

abilities.name: invoker_alacrity
abilities.title: Alacrity
abilities.detail: Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of Wex and their damage based on the level of Exort.

abilities.name: invoker_chaos_meteor
abilities.title: Chaos Meteor
abilities.detail: Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of Exort, and rolling further based on the level of Wex. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of Exort.

abilities.name: invoker_sun_strike
abilities.title: Sun Strike
abilities.detail: Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the Earth. Deals damage based on the level of Exort, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

abilities.name: invoker_forge_spirit
abilities.title: Forge Spirit
abilities.detail: Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage, health, and armor are based on the level of Exort while attack range, mana, and duration are based on the level of Quas. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. If both Quas and Exort are level 4 or higher, Invoker will create two spirits instead of one.

abilities.name: invoker_ice_wall
abilities.title: Ice Wall
abilities.detail: Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of Quas. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of Quas and deals damage each second based on the level of Exort.

abilities.name: invoker_deafening_blast
abilities.title: Deafening Blast
abilities.detail: Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of Exort. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of Quas, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of Wex.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb
abilities.title: Arcane Orb
abilities.detail:
Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.  Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.

Arcane Orb is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment
abilities.title: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.detail: Places a target allied or enemy hero into an astral prison.  The hidden hero is invulnerable and disabled.  When cast on an enemy Hero, Harbinger temporarily steals intelligence from that hero.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_essence_aura
abilities.title: Essence Aura
abilities.detail: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore 25% of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse
abilities.title: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.detail:
Deals damage to enemy Heroes in an area of effect based on the difference between Harbinger and the affected Hero's intelligence. If the Hero takes less than the damage threshold, that Hero loses 75% of its current mana.  Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped in Astral Imprisonment.  If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse has no effect.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
